summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Al Taj Restaurant multi-branch platform with new features: table management, delivery fleet, order routing. All backend API tests passed (26/27, 1 skipped). Frontend UI tests verified customer order flow, delivery dashboard, kitchen dashboard, and waiter dashboard.
critical_code_review_comments: All features implemented correctly and working as expected
Table selection for dine-in orders working with proper validation
Delivery availability check working - disables delivery when no partners available
Order routing to appropriate dashboards working correctly
Table status transitions (vacant → occupied → cleaning → vacant) working
seed_data_creation: Test orders created with TEST_ prefix for cleanup
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features tested and working: 1) Table management with states (vacant/occupied/cleaning), 2) Delivery fleet management with availability tracking, 3) Customer table selection for dine-in orders, 4) Delivery availability check before allowing delivery orders, 5) New Delivery Dashboard for delivery partners, 6) Order routing based on type. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_restaurant_features.py cover all CRUD operations and status flows.

table_management.details: Tables show correct status (vacant/occupied/cleaning), table selection works for dine-in orders, table status changes to occupied when order placed

delivery_fleet.details: Delivery partners can login, see dashboard, toggle availability, pickup orders, update delivery status (picked_up → on_the_way → delivered)

customer_order_flow.details: Branch selection, order type selection (dine-in/takeaway/delivery), table selection for dine-in, cart management, checkout with validation

kitchen_dashboard.details: Shows all order types with status columns (Pending/Confirmed/Preparing/Ready), can update order status

waiter_dashboard.details: Shows table overview with status badges, can mark tables as vacant after cleaning, shows active dine-in orders

delivery_dashboard.details: Shows orders ready for pickup, availability toggle, partner profile with vehicle info, delivery status updates
